TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileVersionInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 为磁盘上的物理文件提供版本信息。

span.span: Provides version information for a physical file on disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，用于保存文件的版本号，如下所示：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一个 16 位均为数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位均为数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位均为数。The last 16 bits are the number. 使用若要获取此类方法包含文件有关的信息，然后查看有关文件的信息的属性。Use the method of this class to get a containing information about a file, then look at the properties for information about the file. 属性提供有关文件的版本信息。The property provides version information about the file. ， ， ， ，和属性提供了指定的文件的一部分的产品的版本信息。The , , , , and properties provide version information for the product that the specified file is a part of. 调用若要获取此文件的属性及其值的部分列表。Call to get a partial list of properties and their values for this file. 属性基于内置到文件的版本资源信息。The properties are based on version resource information built into the file. 版本资源通常内置二进制文件，如.exe 或.dll 文件;文本文件没有版本资源信息。Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information. 在 Win32 资源文件，或程序集特性通常指定版本资源。Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. 例如属性反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`标记的文件中的值`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`块中，它构建从`VERSIONINFO`Win32 资源文件中的资源。For example the property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file. 有关 Win32 资源文件中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅"关于资源文件中"和"VERSIONINFO 资源"平台 SDK 中。For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see "About Resource Files" and "VERSIONINFO Resource" in the Platform SDK. 有关.NET 模块中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅[设置程序集特性](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md)主题。For more information about specifying version resources in a .NET module, see the [Setting Assembly Attributes](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md) topic. > [!NOTE] > 此类，可以在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。This class makes a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full trust permission. 有关链接要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中的说明和版本数。Then it prints the file description and version number in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 对于直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的代码不能使用此类。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 获取与文件关联的注释。

span.span: Gets the comments associated with the file.

value.span: 与文件关联的注释，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 。

span.span: The comments associated with the file or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含可以显示用于诊断目的的其他信息。This property contains additional information that can be displayed for diagnostic purposes. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它输出中的文本框中的注释。Then it prints the comments in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. span.span: A value representing the build number of the file or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，用于保存文件的版本号，如下所示：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一个 16 位均为数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位均为数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位均为数。The last 16 bits are the number. 此属性获取第三个组 16 位。This property gets the third set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo GetVersionInfo(string fileName) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetVersionInfo (fileName As String) As FileVersionInfo

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要检索其版本信息的文件的完全限定路径和名称。

span.span: The fully qualified path and name of the file to retrieve the version information for.

summary.span: 返回表示与指定文件关联的版本信息的 。

span.span: Returns a representing the version information associated with the specified file.
A containing information about the file.

returns.span: 如果文件不包含版本信息，则 仅包含所请求文件的名称。

span.span: If the file did not contain version information, the contains only the name of the file requested.

public: property bool IsDebug { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定文件是否包含调试信息或在调试功能启用的情况下进行编译。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled.

value.span: 如果文件包含调试信息或在调试功能启用的情况下进行编译，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性基于内置到文件的版本资源信息。The properties are based on version resource information built into the file. 版本资源通常内置二进制文件，如.exe 或.dll 文件;文本文件没有版本资源信息。Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information. 在 Win32 资源文件，或程序集特性通常指定版本资源。Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. 属性反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`标记的文件中的值`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`块中，它构建从`VERSIONINFO`Win32 资源文件中的资源。The property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file. 有关 Win32 资源文件中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK`About Resource Files`主题和`VERSIONINFO Resource`主题的主题。For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see the Platform SDK `About Resource Files` topic and `VERSIONINFO Resource` topic topics. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它显示的状态的布尔值在文本框中。Then it displays the state of the Boolean in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file has been modified and is not identical to the original shipping file of the same version number.

value.span: 如果该文件修补过，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the file is patched; otherwise, .

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a development version, rather than a commercially released product.

value.span: 如果该文件是预发行版本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the file is prerelease; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPrivateBuild As Boolean
public: property bool IsPrivateBuild { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定文件是否采用标准的发行过程生成。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file was built using standard release procedures.

value.span: 如果文件为专用版本，值为 ；如果文件是采用标准发行过程生成的或如果文件不包含版本信息，则值为 。

span.span: if the file is a private build; if the file was built using standard release procedures or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此值为`true`，将介绍此版本的文件的标准版本的不同方式。If this value is `true`, will describe how this version of the file differs from the standard version. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它在文本框中显示的专用生成信息。Then it displays the private build information in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSpecialBuild As Boolean
public: property bool IsSpecialBuild { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定该文件是否为特殊内部版本。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a special build.

value.span: 如果该文件为特殊内部版本，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the file is a special build; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 采用标准发行过程生成的文件的特殊内部版本，但文件不同于相同版本号的标准文件。A file that is a special build was built using standard release procedures, but the file differs from a standard file of the same version number. 如果此值为`true`，则属性必须指定此文件的标准版本的不同方式。If this value is `true`, the property must specify how this file differs from the standard version. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后显示该版本是否为特殊内部版本中的文本框。Then it displays whether this version is a special build version in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProductBuildPart As Integer
public: property int ProductBuildPart { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取该文件关联产品的生成号。

span.span: Gets the build number of the product this file is associated with.

value.span: 表示与此文件关联的产品的生成号的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 。

span.span: A value representing the build number of the product this file is associated with or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 产品版本编号是一个 64 位数字持有的版本号，如下所示：A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows: - 第一个 16 位均为数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位均为数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位均为数。The last 16 bits are the number. 此属性获取第三个组 16 位。This property gets the third set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 与此文件一起发行的产品的版本，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 。

span.span: The version of the product this file is distributed with or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 产品版本编号是一个 64 位数字持有的版本号，如下所示：A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows: - 第一个 16 位均为数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位均为数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位均为数。The last 16 bits are the number. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: property System::String ^ SpecialBuild { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取文件的特殊内部版本信息。

span.span: Gets the special build information for the file.

value.span: 文件的特殊内部版本信息，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 。

span.span: The special build information for the file or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，必须指定此文件如何不同于标准版本的文件。If is `true`, must specify how this file differs from the standard version of the file. ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中的特殊内部版本信息。Then it prints the special build information in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例调用若要获取记事本。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它调用打印中的文本框中的文件版本信息的列表。Then it calls to print a list of the file version information in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
